name: Ranma ½: Chounai Gekitou-hen
storyline: Ranma learns of a martial arts tournament in which the grand prize is a invitation to see China. Desperate to rid himself of his Jusenkyo curse, Ranma decides to enter the tournament, but the other characters also hear of the tournament and decide to enter as well to either hope to rid themselves of their own curses, or to simply cause Ranma trouble.
summary: This game is a 2D fighting game and was the first ever Ranma ½ game released.
